General.Name: Jourdeness Group Ltd
General.Description: Jourdeness Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes cosmetics. It is involved in the beauty and body spa business, which include online beauty courses; and management and consulting activities. It operates approximately 600  beauty and body care stores in Taiwan, Mainland China, and Malaysia. Jourdeness Group Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in the Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: 802 West Bay Road, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
